caption.p: Protection Against A/PR/8/34 lethal challenge. Mice were immunized with either 10 8 or 10 10 virus particles of recombinant Ad5-Mosaic, Ad5-A/PR/8/34, Ad5-Pdm09, 600 ng Fluzone, or PBS and challenged with 100MLD 50 of a A/PR8/34 virus three weeks later ( n = 5). Mice were monitored daily after challenge and humanely euthanized if 25% weight loss was recorded. ( A, B) Weight loss for individual mice, ( C, D) average weight loss, and ( E, F) percent survival are reported (data for average weight loss is reported as the mean with standard error; survival data was analyzed with log rank test compared to the PBS control; ** p < 0.01, * p < 0.05).
